Reviews.Title: A Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Francisco Alba "Wizard"
Reviews.Content: A great camera for the Price !This Vivitar camera is fantastic! It is inexpensive. It has features found only in more expensive cameras. It is a technology marvel. I recommend it to beginner photographers.The Vivitar 8 megapixels digital camera is a great camera ! The camera is packed with many features. The camera has a 2.4 preview screen touch screen menu. It is a high definition camera.This camera has anti shake technology.The camera has other great features .The camera has face detection.It has a 4 x zoom. This is a very light camera. it weights 6.4 ounces.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: dre
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the price. Just a note this camera does not work without a sd card up to 8. Works well for the price...is slim and easy to tuck away in my cell phone pocket.

Reviews.Title: Ok for a kid.....
Reviews.Author: Jmp640
Reviews.Content: Not a very good camera. Bought it for a child, so I can't complain. She will probably break it anyways....

Reviews.Title: SAKAR Vivatar Camera
Reviews.Author: DOROTHY FREY
Reviews.Content: Camera was exceptional in every way!  Young teen was excited to see the good quality and touch screen.  So glad to receive it.

Reviews.Title: haven't gotten my SIM card yet :(
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Powder Puff "Sabrina"
Reviews.Content: I can update this if I get it, but so far I havent' gotten my SIM card that was supposed to be shipped with it and I'm buumed. I have a trip coming up soon and those Britney Spears pics aren't going to take themselves. BRITNEYFEST 2014 beyotch!The camera is really slimline & has a nice power adapter. It was easy to put together without reading the directions. We shall see, Vivitar. You better get crackin. I have lots of Vegas adventures to document.
